text: Skate 2 is a skateboarding video game that was published by Electronic Arts. It is available for the PlayStation 3 and the Xbox 360 systems. The game was the third in the Skate video game series, after Skate It! It was followed by Skate 3 which was released in 2010. The game got very good reviews with a 7.5 out of 10 from GameSpot and a 83 out of 100 from Metacritic. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official game website Category:2009 video games Category:Skate (series) Category:Electronic Arts video games Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:Multiplayer online games Category:Open-world video games Category:PlayStation 3 games Category:Skateboarding video games Category:Video game sequels Category:Xbox 360 games
title: Skate 2
